ce. | | status | `'string'` | Status of the activity. The status is "ACTIVE" for simulator flights assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed simulator flights. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Roster Notices Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | date | `'date'` | Date of the notice in UTC | | notice | `'string'` | Special notes for a specific roster day | | type | `'string'` | Type of the notice | | status | `'string'` | Status of the notice. ACTIVE or CANCELLED | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Notification Alerts Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | startDate | `'dateTime'` | Start date and time of the notification in UTC | | endDate | `'dateTime'` | End date and time of the notification in UTC | | alertDate | `'dateTime'` | Validity date and time of the notification alert in UTC | | type | `'string'` | Type of the notification. RELEASED or PREPARING | | status | `'string'` | Status of the notification. When the type is 'RELEASED', the status can be: 'INACTIVE', 'F', 'N', 'T', 'C', 'S', and 'M'. When the type is 'PREPARING', the status can be: 'ACTIVE' and 'INACTIVE'.

ACTIVE: Active notification, INACTIVE: Informed or deleted notification, F: The change of the crew member's roster is finished, N: The change is not finished yet, T: the notification item is transmitted via CrewLink for printing, C: While the crew member is printing, the notifications are changed, S : The notification is sent in SMS, M: the notification is sent in e-mail | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Qualifications Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------
